caption.p: Changes in arabinose (a), fructose (b), malate (c), mannose (d), frutose 6‐phosphate (e), glucose 6‐Phosphate (f), galactose (g), and glucose (h) in Ludwigia grandiflora roots of aquatic and terrestrial morphotypes in aquatic (Am‐a, Tm‐a) or terrestrial (Am‐t, Tm‐t) conditions. All values were expressed in nmol/mg of dry mass of roots. Same letter indicates non‐different values (α = .05)
